item.description:
Coffee Talk and Arts & Creative Cultural Events are having a joint Meet Up Event.

Even if you are in both groups, please RSVP for both group's events.

From Kelly's RSVP;

t is time again for Gale to play her lovely piano music at cozy Cugino's in Cheshire, and I would like to invite all my meetup friends, new and old,  and all friends of friends to come together to have a good meal, relax, meet new people, and enjoy a sweet serenade.

For those of you who have not heard Gale B. Gardiner before, her music is quite lovely and soulful. Cugino's is a nice place for dinner, somewhere that you can talk and socialize without shouting, even when the wonderful piano music is being played!

There is no cover charge for this evening, but you will likely want to enjoy a wonderful Northern Italian meal accompanied by owner Baki's warm hospitality.

You can learn more about Gale and her music here:

http://www.cdbaby.com/cd/galebgardiner3

www.cdbaby.com/cd/galebgardiner3

From Gale:

Thanks Kelly for organizing this, another fun Cugino's TGIF evening, the last one before ...May! Happy to take requests, will be doing some singing with the piano too. Would be great to see familiar Meet Up friends, and new. This will be my first time back to Cugino's since it has officially become Spring, lots to celebrate!

http://cheshire.patch.com/listings/cuginos-italian-restaurant

cheshire.patch.com/listings/cuginos-italian-restaurant

 

http://www.dreats.com/restaurants/Connecticut/Cheshire/Cuginos-Pizza-Restaurant-9136

www.dreats.com/restaurants/Connecticut/Cheshire/Cuginos-Pizza-Restaurant-9136
item.how_to_find_us: Kelly is hosting this event for the Arts Group. She is our Point of Contact for Coffee Talk.
item.name: CT: April Showers bring fun Cugino's Hours!
